column.description: Time at which default objects updated

column.description: Time at which all objects updated

column.description: Time at which last Full Sync occurred

column.description: AD Sync Id.

column.description: Domain Name

column.name: OBJECT_TYPE
column.description: Type of object

column.description: Method used for last update

column.name: COOKIE_VALUE
column.description: Previous Cookie

column.name: COOKIE_DC_NAME
column.description: Name of domain controller while using cookie

column.description: Previous highest USNChanged

column.description: Name of domain controller while using usn

column.name: INVOCATION_ID
column.description: Invocation ID of Domain Controller

column.name: FULL_REFRESHED_TIME
column.description: Time at which last Full Sync occurred

column.name: DOMAIN_ID
column.description: DOMAIN_ID of the domain in which sync must happen

column.name: SEARCH_STRING
column.description: Search string to get all objects of given type

column.name: IS_ENABLED
column.description: Whether this type is enable or not to fetch objects.

column.name: IS_FULL_REFRESEH_ENABLED
column.description: Whether this type is enable or not to do full sync if time exceeds full refresh interval.

column.name: IS_FUNCTIONAL_LEVEL_BASED
column.description: Whether this type cookie sync based on forest functional level

column.name: PRIORITY_ID
column.description: Priority in which objects are updated

column.name: BASE_DN
column.description: Search string to get all objects of given type

column.name: SEARCH_PREFERENCE
column.description: ADS_SEARCHPREF_DIRSYNC_FLAG Example:2048 (LDAP_DIRSYNC_ANCESTORS_FIRST_ORDER(0x00000800))

column.name: UNIQUE_ID
column.description: Unique Id for a product.

column.name: FULL_REFRESH_INTERVAL
column.description: For how many hours once full sync should happen

column.name: FULL_REFRESH_UNIT_OF_TIME
column.description: Unit of interval once full sync should happen

column.name: OTHER_OBJ_REFRESH_INTERVAL
column.description: For how many hours once other objects should updated

column.name: OTHER_OBJ_UNIT_OF_TIME
column.description: Unit of interval once other objects should updated

column.name: LISTENER_IMPL_CLASS_NAME
column.description: Class used for update DB in product

column.name: ENABLE_AUDIT
column.description: Enable to update status of ADSync

column.name: SYNC_RETRIEVAL_METHOD
column.description: Check the Retrieval Method

column.name: DATA_SYNC_ID
column.description: Data Sync Id Id for storing ADSync data required for multiple products

column.name: AUDIT_ID
column.description: AUDIT Id for a product.

column.name: DOMAIN_NAME
column.description: Domain Name

column.name: SYNC_START_TIME
column.description: Time at which sync is started

column.name: SYNC_END_TIME
column.description: >Time at which sync is completed

column.name: LAST_METHOD_USED
column.description: Method used for last update

column.name: IS_FULL_SYNC
column.description: is full sync of the domain

column.name: IS_OTHER_OBJS_SYNC
column.description: is other objects are updating

column.name: STATUS_MESSAGE
column.description: Status of the Sync

column.name: OBJECT_ID
column.description: Unique Id for a object in a product.

column.description: LDAP Name of attribute
